other

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • other.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Eylam Tagor Represents one of the game's Players, and manages merchants, territory and income.

    • Constructor Summary

      Player(int id, int balance, java.lang.String name, java.awt.Color color, Merchant merchant)
      Creates a new Player object with 1 regular merchant and 1 territory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(int id,
              int balance,
              java.lang.String name,
              java.awt.Color color,
              Merchant merchant)
        Creates a new Player object with 1 regular merchant and 1 territory.
        Parameters:
        id - the player's number in relation to other players
        balance - the player's starting balance, used to expand territory and upgrade merchants
        name - the username of the player
        color - the player's color
        initX - the player's initial starting location's x-coordinate
        initY - the player's initial starting location's y-coordinate
